name: B. Multiply by 2, divide by 6
statement:
You are given an integer n. In one move, you can either multiply n by
two or divide n by 6 (if it is divisible by 6 without the
remainder).Your task is to find the minimum number of moves needed to
obtain 1 from n or determine if it’s impossible to do that.You have to
answer t independent test cases.
